(yea, I was using the xml extractor...)

I got it now!!

The problem was wh=
ere I was looking at... 
And this can be solved by using org.archive.crawle=
r.scope.PathScope. 
I was using domain scope, and it didn't allow the herit=
rix to get
links from another domain....

Thanks a lot to be so fast to ans=
wer! I will be back with some
234234223 more questions...
